subtitles.transcript: We’ve been so good at overcoming obstacle after obstacle
that I think to some extent the legislature thinks, “Well, we’ll just keep putting burdens on them.”
But I think what we need to do is step back and say, “Let’s compare us with private universities
and ask, “Okay, so we all know the private sector is better in America than the public sector, right?”
That’s the canon out there in the world.
So let’s go look at the private sector and what they do and let’s look at what we do.
It turns out that we do it at half the cost and even less than the private sector.
Wow, that’s pretty good! And we deliver an identical product.
Oh my gosh! Maybe there are circumstances in which the private sector does a remarkable job.
Yes, it’s called the University of California.
